@graph.name: Indian Gooseberry Preserve Wheat Bread (Amla Murabba in Bread) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Indian Gooseberry Preserve Wheat Bread. A simple and delicious recipe. The bread is delicious for sandwiches or snacking.

itemListElement.name: Indian Gooseberry Preserve Wheat Bread (Amla Murabba in Bread)

@graph.name: Indian Gooseberry Preserve Wheat Bread (Amla Murabba In Bread)
@graph.description: Indian Gooseberry Preserve Wheat Bread. A simple and delicious recipe. This bread is delicious for sandwiches or snacking.

recipeInstructions.text: Warm half a cup of water and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well
recipeInstructions.name: Warm half a cup of water and add sugar and yeast to it. Mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the seed from the Gooseberries and Coarsely blend them with the syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the seed from the Gooseberries and Coarsely blend them with the syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours, salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours, salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oil, egg, yeast mixture, gooseberries and and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oil, egg, yeast mixture, gooseberries and and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.
recipeInstructions.name: Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
